backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing asset management logic with equipment, spare parts, cataloguing, maintenance, documents, user profiles, and access control storage and helpers.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module passing old userProfiles map through unchanged since the schema remains identical.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a draft rebuild trigger to related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of all frontend source files for quick reference during build planning.
frontend/DRAFT_REBUILD_TRIGGER.md: Dummy file used only to force creation of a new draft deployment without functional changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router setup defining all app routes and wrapping the UI with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AutocompleteText: Autocomplete text input with portaled dropdown, filtering, focus handling, and keyboard navigation.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.ts: Reusable confirmation dialog component wrapping alertâ€‘dialog UI with customizable text and actions.
Dropdown with searchable filtering for selecting equipment by number, tag, or name using equipment data from useGetAllEquipment.
frontend/src/components/EquipmentNameDro: Autocomplete text input for equipment names using a static suggestion list.
Generic form field wrapper displaying label, children, help text, and errors.
frontend/src/components/HeaderAuthContro: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication with status handling and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: Page wrapper providing header, footer, and main content layout with auth control.
frontend/src/components/SparePartNameDro: Autocomplete text input for spare part names using a static suggestion list.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Retrieves and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout functions, and initializes identity from storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating equipment and related backend data using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for theming including dark mode.
frontend/src/lib/cataloguingTemplates.ts: Defines cataloguing templates by discipline and returns template fields by name.
frontend/src/lib/csvImport.ts: Parses CSV text into objects, validates equipment and spare part rows, and provides date/bigint parsing helpers.
frontend/src/lib/dates.ts: Formats bigint timestamps to readable dates and converts date strings to bigint nanoseconds.
frontend/src/lib/disciplines.ts: Defines engineering discipline options and maps between enum values and labels.
frontend/src/lib/errors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages and detects authentication or config issues.
frontend/src/lib/exports.ts: Exports data to CSV or PDF and provides a CSV template download utility.
frontend/src/lib/files.ts: Converts browser File objects to ExternalBlob and formats file sizes.
frontend/src/lib/importMappings.ts: Maps imported CSV rows to equipment or spare part objects, applying type conversions and discipline mapping.
frontend/src/lib/productionChecks.ts: Checks backend actor for required methods and throws or returns messages if methods are missing.
frontend/src/lib/staticNameLists.ts: Provides sorted static lists of equipment and spare part names for autocomplete.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Basic validators for required fields, numbers, and email format.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CataloguingPage.tsx: UI for creating, editing, and deleting cataloguing records with equipment lookup and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: Provides UI to upload, list, edit, and delete equipment-linked documents with progress tracking and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentListPage.tsx: Displays searchable/filterable equipment list and supports editing and deleting equipment via dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentMasterPage.t: Form page for creating new equipment records with validation and backend integration.
frontend/src/pages/ImportPage.tsx: Handles CSV import for equipment and spare parts, including preview, validation, and bulk creation.
frontend/src/pages/MaintenancePage.tsx: Manages creation, viewing, editing, and deletion of maintenance records tied to equipment.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Implements a reports page that fetches equipment, spare parts, and maintenance data and provides CSV/PDF export functions for each report type.
frontend/src/pages/SparePartsPage.tsx: Provides a UI to create, edit, delete, search, and view spare parts with file attachments and equipment association, including dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, current features, and state information for the Maintenance Hub project.
